title: BADS Error
body:
BADS Error happened again,, i can not log in LOL on Morning.. is anyone has the same problem as me?

My internet working is fine ,, what is wrong with Rito?{{champion:54}}

replies.body: Do you mean RADS?, If so please post the logs.

No, it's not RADICAL enough to be RADS, brah. It's just BADS.

Please slap my face, that was a terrible joke.
